cssmd:cssmd.description: CSS supported by IE6 validation data

cssmd:property-def.description: Color of an element's text
cssmd:property-def.enum: AliceBlue AntiqueWhite Aqua Aquamarine Azure Beige Bisque Black BlanchedAlmond Blue BlueViolet Brown Burlywood CadetBlue Chartreuse Chocolate Coral CornflowerBlue Cornsilk Crimson Cyan DarkBlue DarkCyan DarkGoldenrod DarkGray DarkGreen DarkKhaki DarkMagenta DarkOliveGreen DarkOrange DarkOrchid DarkRed DarkSalmon DarkSeaGreen DarkSlateBlue DarkSlateGray DarkTurquoise DarkViolet DeepPink DeepSkyBlue DimGray DodgerBlu Firebrick FloralWhite ForestGreen Fuchsia Gainsboro GhostWhite Gold Goldenrod Gray Green GreenYellow Honeydew HotPink IndianRed Indigo Ivory Khaki Lavender LavenderBlush LawnGreen LemonChiffon LightBlue LightCoral LightCyan LightGoldenrodYellow LightGreen LightGrey LightPink LightSalmon LightSeaGreen LightSkyBlue LightSlateGray LightSteelBlue LightYellow Lime LimeGreen Linen Magenta Maroon MediumAquamarine MediumBlue MediumOrchid MediumPurple MediumSeaGreen MediumSlateBlue MediumSpringGreen MediumTurquoise MediumVioletRed MidnightBlue MintCream MistyRose Moccasin NavajoWhite Navy Oldlace Olive OliveDrab Orange OrangeRed Orchid PaleGoldenrod PaleGreen PaleTurquoise PaleVioletRed PapayaWhip Peachpuff Peru Pink Plum PowderBlue Purple Red RosyBrown RoyalBlue SaddleBrown Salmon SandyBrown SeaGreen Seashell Sienna Silver SkyBlue SlateBlue SlateGray Snow SpringGreen SteelBlue Tan Teal Thistle Tomato Turquoise Violet Wheat White WhiteSmoke Yellow YellowGreen Transparent ActiveBorder ActiveCaption AppWorkspace Background ButtonFace ButtonHighlight ButtonShadow ButtonText CaptionText GrayText Highlight HighlightTxt InactiveBorder InactiveCaption InactiveCaptionText InfoBackground InfoText Menu MenuText Scrollbar ThreeDDarkShadow ThreeDFace ThreeDHighlight ThreeDLighShadow ThreeDShadow Window WindowFrame WindowText

cssmd:property-def.description: Font used for an element's text
cssmd:property-def.enum: caption icon menu message-box small-caption status-bar

cssmd:property-def.description: Name of the font used for an element's text
Style of the font used for an element's text
Variant of the font used for an element's text
Size of the font used for an element's text
cssmd:property-def.syntax: length | percentage | standard font size value
cssmd:property-def.enum: large larger medium small smaller x-large x-small xx-large xx-small

cssmd:property-def.description: Boldness of the font used for an element's text
Decorations applied to font used for an element's text
Background of an element

cssmd:property-def.description: Image used for an element's background
How the background image is attached to an element within the document
How the background image is tiled within an element
How the background is positioned within an element
How the background is positioned within an element
How the background is positioned within an element
The horizontal alignment of an element's text
The vertical alignment of an element's text
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the vertical-align values | a unit
cssmd:property-def.enum: baseline bottom middle sub super text-bottom text-top top

cssmd:property-def.description: The spacing between characters
The spacing between lines
The indentation of text
Letter case of the text
The spacing between words
A value that indicates whether lines are automatically broken inside the object
Line-breaking rules for Japanese text
Defines how to align the last line or only line of text in the object
Autospacing and narrow space width adjustment of text
Alignment used to justify text in the object
cssmd:property-def.enum: auto distribute distribute-all-lines distribute-center-last inter-cluster inter-ideograph inter-word kashida newspaper

cssmd:property-def.description: Ratio of kashida expansion to white space expansion when justifying lines of text in the object
Indicates whether to render ellipses(...) to indicate text overflow
Position of the underline decoration that is set through the textDecoration property
Line-breaking behavior within words, particularly where multiple languages appear in the object
Defines whether to break words when the content exceeds the boundaries of its container
Direction and flow of the content in the object
The display mode of an element
cssmd:property-def.enum: block inline inline-block list-item none table-footer-group table-header-group

cssmd:property-def.description: Edge of the object on which text will flow
Sides on which floating objects will not be allowed
The visibility of an element
The positioning mode of an element
The stacking order of a positioned element
The left edge of a positioned element
The right edge of a positioned element
The top edge of a positioned element
The bottom edge of a positioned element
Visibility of content extending beyond element's dimensions
Defines how to manage the content of the object when the content exceeds the width of the object
Defines how to manage the content of the object when the content exceeds the height of the object
The clipping rectangle of an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: rect([top unit] [right unit] [bottom unit] [left unit]) | auto

cssmd:property-def.description: The width of a positioned element
The height of a positioned element
Constrains box height
Direction and flow of the content in the object
Composite document grid properties that specify the layout of text characters
Size of the character grid used for rendering the text content of an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the layout-grid-char values | a unit

cssmd:property-def.description: Gridline value used for rendering the text content of an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the layout-grid-line values | a unit

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies whether the text layout grid uses two dimensions
Type of grid used for rendering the text content of an element
The padding around all four edges of an element
The padding on the left edge of an element
The padding on the right edge of an element
The padding on the top edge of an element
The padding on the bottom edge of an element
The margin around all four edges of an element
The margin on the left edge of an element
The margin on the right edge of an element
The margin on the top edge of an element
The margin on the bottom edge of an element
The border around all four edges of an element
The border on the left edge of an element
The border on the right edge of an element
The border on the top edge of an element
The border on the bottom edge of an element
The color of the border around all four edges of an element

cssmd:property-def.description: The cursor over an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the cursor values | url([url to the cursor resource])
cssmd:property-def.enum: all-scroll auto col-resize crosshair default e-resize hand help move n-resize ne-resize no-drop not-allowed nw-resize pointer progress row-resize s-resize se-resize sw-resize text vertical-text w-resize wait

cssmd:property-def.description: Indicates whether the object contains an accelerator key

cssmd:property-def.syntax: sequence of visual filters and transitions

cssmd:property-def.description: State of an Input Method Editor (IME)
magnification scale of the object
